lines.text: I'm sorry if I missed anything in life that would make me a better artist. Oh, I know I need training and help and advice. Well, there's nothing I wouldn't do.
What I want to know is, what happened? Did he make love to you?
Diana, does a career mean more to you than self-respect?
Your kisses are divine. Your kisses... Potter?
Why, it, eh, it was the red haired lady who swooned when we kissed her, sir.
